title: Looking for peeps to play normals with me and a friend
body: Me and a friend looking for some non toxic players to play normal's with. Skill level not much of an issue, just anyone better than bronze 2 really. Skype needed for comms. Add me in game. I play jungle he plays mid/top. No toxic players. We also have a few other friends that we some times play with , but we are looking for others who play consistently and most days.

replies.body:
"skill level not needed" Â¬ "anyone better than bronze 2".
Yes martin I'll take hypocrisy for 20 points.

Please dont misquote. It is actually "Skill level not much of an issue". And even if I did use what you quoted, it would still not be hypocrisy, hypocrisy would be if I was a bronze 5 saying the same thing.
